body.p: Ventilation clearance: recommended 6" minimum ventilation clearance on rear and both sides; 18" overhead clearance also recommended.

Service clearance: 36" required front access; 36" required side clearance for Side Cars with side access. 36" service clearance is also required in PDU rear to access transformer taps and infrared scanning unless the transformer is rotated.
Cabling: 12" under floor cabling clearance is recommended for raised floor.
